title: New 24h branding service closes the gap between Agencies and AI-Tools
description: Zürich, Zh, Aug. 15, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Startups under pressure to prove traction to investors and customers may soon find less time lost in branding limbo. Sosai Studio, a hybrid design studio combining artificial intelligence with human creativity, has launched a 24-hour brand identity service aimed at helping early-stage companies signal market readiness without the long timelines and high costs of traditional agencies.

title: Bitcoin Swift Enters Final Four Days of Stage 5 Presale With Over $700,000 in Sales and $60,000+ Rewards Distributed
description: **media[715456]**LUXEMBOURG, Aug. 15, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Bitcoin Swift (BTC3), a blockchain project integrating artificial intelligence (AI) with a Proof-of-Yield (PoY) reward system, has entered the final four days of Stage 5 in its ongoing presale. The project has reported participation from more than 2,600 investors, generating over $700,000 in token sales to date and distributing more than $60,000 in staking rewards since the presale began.

title: Murder case in Australia reveals AI-generated mishap
description: An Australian lawyer filed submissions in a murder case that included incorrect information generated by artificial intelligence.
content:
A senior lawyer in Australia has apologized to a judge for filing submissions in a murder case that included fake quotes and nonexistent case judgments generated by artificial intelligence.
The blunder in the Supreme Court of Victoria state is anothe... [3146 chars]

title: DIAGNOS to Extend Stock Warrants Exercise Period
description: BROSSARD, Quebec, Aug. 15, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Diagnos Inc. ('DIAGNOS” or the 'Corporation”) (TSX Venture: ADK, OTCQB: DGNOF, FWB: 4D4A), a pioneer in early detection of critical health issues using advanced technology based on Artificial Intelligence (AI), announces that it intends to extend the exercise period of an aggregate of 650,000 stock warrants (each a 'Warrant”) issued as part of a non-brokered private placement of units initially announced on March 22, 2024. The Warrants initial exercise period is set to expire on September 22, 2025.

title: Currenc Group Inc. Announces CEO Transition
description: SINGAPORE, Aug. 15, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Currenc Group Inc. (Nasdaq: CURR) ('Currenc” or the 'Company”), a fintech pioneer empowering financial institutions worldwide with artificial intelligence (AI) solutions, today announced that Dr. Ronnie Hui has stepped down as Chief Executive Officer. Alex Kong, Currenc’s Founder and Executive Chairman, will assume the Chief Executive Officer position.

title: AI Priorities: Decision-Making Over Automation for Enterprises
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) is primarily seen by large enterprises as a tool to improve decision-making rather than simply automate processes. This preference is based on insights from a 2025 survey of IT leaders, highlighting the value of AI in operations, finance, and customer service, despite certain barriers.
content: In a recent survey, large enterprises have identified artificial intelligence (AI) as a key enabler for improved decision-making processes, shifting focus away from its use purely as an automation tool, according to the business-to-business publicati... [632 chars]
